Articles.Content: Hey guys, I'm TheJewelOfJool, A long time lurker and player, but first time poster. I live in the land of snow, beavers, moose, syrup, maple leafs, and hockey. Also know as Canada. Everybody thinks that Canada is a generally cold climate, but down here in Southwestern Ontario where I live(Which is where I live if it wasn't obvious enough.), it's quite the opposite! The one mod that I could not live without is HyperEdit(Yep, I'm a bad boy. Deal with it.). I love building realistic space probes, and I even started a HyperEdit Space Program with probes that I actually had goals for, but that was before I had AIES(AWESOME probe bodies and antennae. So, yeah. AIES FTW dawgs.). BTW, Canadians don't say "Eh" all the time. Stop thinking that. Please.
welcome! I too use hyperedit, but only to get warships to orbit (because otherwise KSP sucks even more time out of your life).
Welcome! Plenty of Canadian players here, eh?
Welcome fellow Canadian! My province is British Columbia where it is rainy and windy and the lack of snow. I'm also annoyed by all the stereotypes.

Hello there fellow Canadian eh!

Here in Alberta, steryotypes are most DEFINITLEY true. 15 cm of snow a few days ago, and right now -30c windchill

Well, excuse me to meet you, have a nice time on the forums, excuse me for posting. (cough Canadians apologize all the time stereotype cough)

ontopic: welcome
Welcome aboard fellow Canadian!! Albertan here, eh! (Sorry could not resist haha). Its so cold here righ tnow I may just build myself a rocket and fly to moho!
Alberta seems to have a few rocketeers aboot, eh?
Hello! Also a Canadian here but currently living in the states!
hello from the sunshine state welcome to the forums.......eh
It's also very cold in British Columbia, but no snow as usual.
Yay! Snow in southern British Columbia! But the snow is only light.
You must be too close to the ocean!! Alberta is better!
